item.title: Venerable Reverie
item.description: Hello Traveller! This is going to be a humble haven for my random adn wandering thoughts, those that I wish to share. Venerable Reverie - I chose this name because of the illusion and goal to become a venerable person at some point and because most of what I write starts as a reverie â€” a drifting thought or passing idea. Stay tuned :)
